text: Jean Petit (25 September 1949 â€“ 23 January 2024) was a French football midfielder. He was a member of the France team which played in the 1978 FIFA World Cup. Petit died on 23 January 2024, at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Footballers from Occitanie
